  ''p\(""""\);'',
  ''p\(""type Props = NativeStackScreenProps<RootStackParamList, \\x27Register\\x27>;""\);'',
  ''p\(""""\);'',
  ''p\(""interface FormErrors {""\);'',
  ''p\(""  fullName?: string;""\);'',
  ''p\(""  username?: string;""\);'',
  ''p\(""  email?: string;""\);'',
  ''p\(""  phone?: string;""\);'',
  ''p\(""  password?: string;""\);'',
  ''p\(""  confirmPassword?: string;""\);'',
  ''p\(""}""\);'',
  ''fs.writeFileSync\(""'' + outPath.replace\(/\\/g,''\\\\\\\\''\) + ''"", lines.join\(""\\n""\), ""utf8""\);'',
  ''console.log\(""partial ok"", lines.length\);''
].join\(''\\n''\);

fs.writeFileSync\(scriptPath, script, ''utf8''\);
console.log\(''writer script created''\);
")
